channel.title: Comments on: Domain of a composite function – part 1

item.title: By: Domain of a composite function – part 2 – Mathemafrica
item.dc:creator: Domain of a composite function – part 2 – Mathemafrica
item.description: […] This is the second part of a post, written by Muhammad Azhar Rohiman, a first year student on MAM1000W at UCT. This post came about when he asked me a question related to domains of composite functions, and it was clear that on first learning about such topics, there are some simple misunderstandings. I suggested that he write a couple of paragraphs explaining what he had learnt, and the following is, I think, a very clear explanation of some of the ideas and pitfalls of this topic. The first part of the post is here. […]
